name: @mblabs/docs-shared
description: Documentation partials shared between project documentation partial repositories
author: Brian Zalewski <brian@megabyte.space> (https://megabyte.space)

blueprint.description: Documentation partials shared between project documentation partial repositories
blueprint.name: Shared Docs
blueprint.overview: This repository contains documentation partials that are propagated downstream to project-type specific documentation partial repositories. For example, in this repository there may be a partial titled `contributing.md` which contains sponsorship links. When those links are updated, the partials in this repository are propagated to the project-type specific repositories (e.g. NPM package documentation, Dockerfile project documentation). The project-type specific documentation partials are then used by the projects that they are intended for. In this way, we can update all the links to Patreon across all of our repositories by editting in just one spot.
blueprint.title: Shared Documentation Partials

descriptions.build: Builds the project using the build command specified under scripts in package.json
descriptions.help: Display the Bodega Taskfile.yml interactive help menu
descriptions.prepare: A hook triggered by running npm install that runs logic such as installing pre-commit hooks
descriptions.repair: Fixes basic issues in projects that are having trouble running basic commands like 'task start'
descriptions.start: Entrypoint for new developers that installs requirements and then runs 'task start'
descriptions.test: Runs the appropriate test logic by running the test command defined under scripts in package.json
